entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: Voldemort is introduced as a powerful and feared character who has the ability to cast spells such as 'Crucio'. He is described as laughing and raising his wand to torture one of his Death Eaters. ("He raised his wand. \"Crucio!\")

entities.name: avery
entities.description: Avery is introduced as a Death Eater who is being tortured by Voldemort. He is described as writhing and shrieking in pain. ("The Death Eater on the ground  writhed and shrieked;")

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is introduced as a character who is watching Voldemort torture one of his Death Eaters. He is described as thinking desperately about calling for help. ("Let the police come, he thought desperately . . . anyone . . . anything . . .")

relationships.description: Voldemort is torturing Avery with the spell 'Crucio'. ("He raised his wand. \"Crucio!\")
Harry is witnessing Voldemort torture one of his Death Eaters. ("The Death Eater on the ground  writhed and shrieked;")
